description.narrative: By mid-2021, 9,965 families (59,790 people) in catchments of 26 rural or hard-to-reach health facilities and all 4 central hospitals of Malawi, receive holistic palliative care and are referred to relevant help with food provision. These health facilities in all 27 mainland districts give patients with life-limiting illness and their families free care as in the National Palliative Care Policy, including pain relief, food supplements, disease information, legal aid, spiritual support, farm training and practical social help.

mailing-address.narrative: 7 Washington Lane EDINBURGH United Kingdom EH11 2HA
